Name: Mine
Description: Anvil can be placed orthagonally. Can be attacked by enemies. Anvils destroy anything they land on top of.

Name: Swap
Description: Switch positions with any other unit.

Name: Immobilize
Description: Immobilize an enemy unit for 1 turn. Orthagonal/line of sight.

Name: Move All
Description: Pushes all enemies 1 tile in chosen direction.
